plot: Morales doesn't pay attention in class and his teacher's patience is running out. If he continues to have that lack of discipline, he will be punished without recess for the rest of the course.
title: Morales
plot_es: Morales doesn't pay attention in class and his teacher's patience is running out. If he continues to have that lack of discipline, he will be punished without recess for the rest of the course.
plot_en: Morales doesn't pay attention in class and his teacher's patience is running out. If he continues to have that lack of discipline, he will be punished without recess for the rest of the course.
